name: stubbly
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
covered with or consisting of the short hairs that grow on a man's face if he has not shaved (= cut the hair) for a few days: He rubbed his stubbly chin. The man had long hair and a stubbly beard.
covered with or consisting of the short stems left after a crop such as wheat has been cut: The land had become a pale stubbly desert. Birds flew over the open, stubbly fields.
More examplesFewer examplesSweat dripped down his stubbly cheeks.He has a stubbly moustache.He left his bike lying on the stubbly grass.The road clung to the stubbly expanse of corn-land.
